sentences.sentence: The high price of food can tax even the hardiest consumer.
sentences.translation: 食品的高价格将被课税，甚至对最困难的消费者也一样。

sentences.sentence: The hardiest members of the species can live to be 2, 000 years old.
sentences.translation: 该树种中最强健的个体可以活到两千多岁。

sentences.sentence: The flu has battered down even the hardiest parts of the immune system.
sentences.translation: 这“流感”甚至已经破坏免疫系统最强大的部分了。
